note.original: tathaṃ pemakaraṃ nu (ka.), tathaṃ paramaṃ karaṃ nu (syā.)
note.snippet: Devā musāvādamupātivattā, saccaṃ dhanaṃ paramaṃ tesu
Pubbeva khantī ca tapo ca mayhaṃ, sampatthitā dubbhisena
Uḍḍayhate na ramati, bhogā vippajahanti taṃ
Tasmā namassāmi imaṃ palāsaṃ, ye cettha bhūtā te
Ubho pakatiyā cutā, yo cāyaṃ mantejjhāpeti
Na icche saha nindāya, evaṃ seyya
Uṭṭhehi cora kiṃ sesi, ko attho supanena
Api kassapa mandiyā, yuvā sapati hanti
Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ vinasā
hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā
Yā daliddī daliddassa, aḍḍhā aḍḍhassa kittima
Manussasseva me sīsaṃ, hatthapādā ca siṅgila
Ariyo hi ariyassa kathaṃ na dajjā

note.original: brāhmaṇassīdha (ka. sī. pī.), brāhmaṇasseva (ka. sī. syā. ka.)

note.snippet: Evaṃ so nihato seti, yo apūjaṃ pasaṃsati
heva ṭhitaṃ nāsīnaṃ, na sayānaṃ na paddhaguṃ

note.original: vata panthe (syā.), vata bandhe (ka.) vata + pa-addhe = vatappaddhe

note.snippet: Gacchāma dāni vanameva rādha, asakkatā casma dhanañjayāya
kaṇṇaṃ bhakuṭiṃ karoti, muhuṃ muhuṃ bhāyayate
Na hi satthaṃ sunisitaṃ, visaṃ halāhalāmiva

note.original: phalaṃva (ka. sī. syā. ka.), dukanipāte puṭabhattajātakena saṃsandetabbaṃ

note.snippet: So te karissāmi yathānubhāvaṃ, kataññutaṃ khattiye

note.original: sabbā tā ujuṃ gacchanti (pī. a. ni. 4.70)
(tiṇassa cāṭīsu gato, tattha kā paridevanā) (sī. syā.) (cāṭīsu pakkhipitvāna, tattha kā paridevanā) (ka.)
note.snippet: Sabbaṃ sakassa ādānaṃ, anādānaṃ tiṇassa ca. ( )
Mā vo dhanaṃ taṃ ahu devarāja
Na katassa ca kattā ca, metti
Kathaṃ nu bhagavā kesī, kappassa ramati assame
tvaṃ vihito nusajja, udāhu me cetayase

note.original: na hi (ka. sī. pī.), te na (ka.)
note.snippet: ca taṃ rakkhati devarājā, tenuttamaṅgaṃ na te
Nālaṃ pisācā yuddhāya, mahatī sā vibhiṃsikāti
Sussūsī ca titikkhī ca, taṃ bhajehi ito
Sa ve rāja piyo hoti, kaṃ tena tvābhipassasi
